LanguageData.HemogenDesc: Water is a vital part of biological homeostatis, cruely extracted almost exclusively from living plants and animals. Occasionally it can be refined through long, complex industrial processes, with almost all wild water being too contaminated to drink. Baseliner humans cannot produce it endogenously and consume it over time in their own internal balance. Humans unable to consume water for long periods of time will be afflicted with the eventual fatal condition known as dehydration.
LanguageData.MessagePawnHadNotEnoughBloodToProduceHem: {PAWN_nameDef} did not have enough internal water to produce a safe water pack.
LanguageData.MessageCannotStartHemogenExtraction: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't have enough internal water to produce a safe water pack.
LanguageData.AutoTakeHemogenDesc: This determines whether {PAWN_nameDef} will automatically ingest safe water packs when {PAWN_possessive} water is below {MIN}.\n\nAutomatic ingestion is currently {ONOFF}.
LanguageData.MSS_Thirst_ThirstCasketHediffTickRate: Interval between ticks to bump the Forced Dehydration hediff by 0.1% on the thirstcasket -> {0}ticks
LanguageData.MSS_Thirst_Incident_ContaminationNetLett: Disaster! While quenching {PAWN_possessive} thirst, {PAWN_nameDef} noticed that the water net has been contaminated by a poisonous algae, which grows in environments with abundant water. {PAWN_pronoun} has purged the storage for the safety of the colony.
LanguageData.MSS_Thirst_Incident_ContaminationLetter: Oh no! While quenching {PAWN_possessive} thirst, {PAWN_nameDef} looked at another {ITEM_label} and noticed that many of them have been contaminated by a corrosive algae, known to proliferate where too much water is present. The algae has eaten through {COUNT} water packs spilling their precious contents.

LanguageData.MSS_Thirst_Settings_SafeWaterPacks: Max water packs on map before contamination possible
LanguageData.MSS_Thirst_Settings_MaxUnsafeWaterPacks: Water packs needed for highest chance of contamination
